actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to establish uniform dates for the holding of Federal primary elections.

summary.text: Requires any State holding a primary election with respect to the office of President or Vice President to hold such primary election on the first Tuesday in June of the year in which the general election for each such office is held. Provides that any State holding a primary election with respect to the office of Senator, Delegate, Resident Commissioner, or Representative shall hold such primary election: (1) in any year in which a general election for the office of President or Vice President is held, on the first Tuesday in June of such year; or (2) in any other year, on the first Tuesday in August of such year.

titles.title: A bill to establish uniform dates for the holding of Federal primary elections.
